item.title: [Python] I want to collect specific files scattered in each folder in one place
item.description: ## Introduction Qiita’s first post. I’ve always taken care of me, so I’m about to publish what I’ve finished. I want to collect specific files scattered in each folder in one place Won’t this happen often? All Folders have the same folder structure, and I want to collect sleeping files (this time mdb files) in sub-sub-folder somewhere. ##Code execution I will forget it every time, so I will leave it below.
